> Note: Actually Release Date is 15 March 2024

## What's Changed
* make the run, restart and restartall buttons optional by `@twyair` in https://github.com/executablebooks/thebe/pull/502
* Bump prettier from 2.3.2 to 2.4.1 by `@dependabot` in https://github.com/executablebooks/thebe/pull/479
